items.title: Windows 11 Stable Update is OUT to Install Now 2021
items.author: Vaibhav Shivaji Wabale
items.description:
What’s new In windows 11?

Windows 11 is a refreshed look for Windows 10 itself. And if you’re a person who likes easy notifications, toggling your Wi-Fi, Bluetooth on a regular basis, this upgrade is specially meant for you, my friend. (close features)

https://icomputercoding.in/windows-11-stable-update-is-out-install-now/

items.title: Network Topologies and Protocols 05
items.author: Vaibhav Shivaji Wabale
items.description:
The network topologies refer to the physical layout of the cables that connect the computers and other peripherals. We wish to have an efficient and effective network that transfers data from one device to other at a faster rate without any collisions. Therefore, network topology plays an important role in designing a network.

Computers file servers, workstations, and other peripherals are called nodes in the computer artworks Data transfers between the nodes in the form of packets.

https://icomputercoding.in/network-topologies-and-protocols/
items.content:

items.title: What is Cyber Security? | Cyber Expo 2021
items.author: Vaibhav Shivaji Wabale
items.description:
Cybersecurity has become a basic requirement for all organizations working to increase their digital access.

Digitalization is useful to all human beings but it has also had several threats. digital advances have improved the way a business can expand its wings, but on the other hand, this has also given wings to cyberattacks, security hacks, and privacy breaches.

https://icomputercoding.in/cyber-security/
items.content:

items.title: Dark Side of the Net: The Dark | What is the Dark Web?
items.author: Vaibhav Shivaji Wabale
items.description:
Can u wonder how gigantic ships like the Titanic were drowned by a small tip of an iceberg? Icebergs are basically small exposed tips of a large catastrophic portion of frozen ice in the Arctic region. In the same way, whatever information is available to us with a click is just 4% of the entire internet!! , same as an iceberg tip.

DARK WEB

The dark web or black web is the dark side of the internet that will force us to visualize illegal drug marketing, propagandist terrorists, and other dark forces throughout the world, serving their sinful purposes.

Dark Side of the Net: The Dark | What is the Dark Web?
items.content:

items.title: What is Cloud Computing? Everything You Need to Know
items.author: Vaibhav Shivaji Wabale
items.description:
I received a mail from my car dealer with a report about the ‘health status of my car. Earlier I thought it was just a regular service mail, or maybe it was a promotional mail trying to sell me their new product. In fact, it was not. It was because of regular my usage of my phone to do free tasks like playing and streaming music. One of the options I should have set for myself is for the car to report generated to its manufacturer about the car on a monthly to monthly basis. This information includes mileage, oil life, and most likely other ‘information’ about the health of the vehicle. Among other things in my life, my car is now talking about the ‘cloud’.

https://icomputercoding.in/cloud-computing/
items.content:

Earlier I thought it was just a regular service mail, or maybe it was a promotional mail trying to sell me their new product. In fact, it was not. This information includes mileage, oil life, and most likely other ‘information’ about the health of the vehicle. Among other things in my life, my car is now talking about the ‘cloud’.

https://icomputercoding.in/cloud-computing/

items.title: Pegasus: A Friend Or a Foe | What is Pegasus? | Dangerous or Not
items.author: Vaibhav Shivaji Wabale
items.description:
What if I say I can hear your voice calls with your wife OR girlfriend? , or what if I say, I can tell u what your boss said to you in your mail? The first probable reaction you may give is — “how do you do that”?

The same reaction is given by many people around the globe who experienced a spyware attack on their devices. Now it can be general curiosity among us to know about spyware, and currently, the Pegasus scandal is more highlighted in Indian news portals asserting us to be more vigilant.

https://icomputercoding.in/pegasus/
